```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
source("MyGraphCode.R")
library(DT)
g <- reactive(MakeMyGraph(input$nNodes))
```

--------------------------------------------------------------------

### Inputs

```{r}
numericInput("nNodes","How many nodes?",60,1,1000)
```

Column

### Graph

```{r}
renderVisNetwork({
  g() %>% PlotMyGraph()
})
```

### Data Table
```{r}
renderDataTable({
  g() %>% 
    as_long_data_frame() %>% 
    datatable()
})
```
